## Goals
- Define write / retain / update / forget operations.
- Formalize fixed-budget external memory with state transitions.
- Define evaluation metrics beyond accuracy.

## Deliverables
- Section 3 draft for paper: definitions + equations.
- Pseudocode for memory update loop.
